#define SWAB32 (   x)
Value:
((uint32_t)(( \
    (ROTR(x, 8) & 0xFF00FF00) | \
    (ROTL(x, 8) & 0x00FF00FF))) + \
        STATIC_ASSERT_EXPR(sizeof(x) == sizeof(uint32_t)))

Reverse bytes in a 32-bit value (e.g.

: 0x12345678 -> 0x78563412).
